about_the_game:
Hello, this is an experimental project with a small gameplay. The gameplay is as straightforward as the name suggests, manipulating your character through the maze, destroying walls to find each other, or hidingsneak attack!! The outcome of the duel is used to decide who will check out or wash the dishes... or other rock-paper-scissors can also solve the problem.
Although you can choose to practice with the AI, we still recommend that you pull a friend to play with you :D Of course, this is not because the AI is too difficult to beat~

Move: A, W, S, D
Rotating lenses: Q, E
Fire: Right mouse button
Smoke grenades: Spaces

Hi players, when you see this description, our servers have been shut down due to experimental and small team reasons. We're sorry you won't be able to use the matchmaking feature, but the ontology's adversarial AI mode still exists, so thank you very much for your interest and willingness to take the time to take a look at our little ideas. Sorry again, thanks again.

If you have any ideas or questions, you are welcome to join the QQ group: 833422358

Hope you have fun and have fun hunting (or being hunted)!
detailed_description:
Hello, this is an experimental project with a small gameplay. The gameplay is as straightforward as the name suggests, manipulating your character through the maze, destroying walls to find each other, or hidingsneak attack!! The outcome of the duel is used to decide who will check out or wash the dishes... or other rock-paper-scissors can also solve the problem.
Although you can choose to practice with the AI, we still recommend that you pull a friend to play with you :D Of course, this is not because the AI is too difficult to beat~

Move: A, W, S, D
Rotating lenses: Q, E
Fire: Right mouse button
Smoke grenades: Spaces

Hi players, when you see this description, our servers have been shut down due to experimental and small team reasons. We're sorry you won't be able to use the matchmaking feature, but the ontology's adversarial AI mode still exists, so thank you very much for your interest and willingness to take the time to take a look at our little ideas. Sorry again, thanks again.

If you have any ideas or questions, you are welcome to join the QQ group: 833422358

Hope you have fun and have fun hunting (or being hunted)!
name: 迷宫坦克大战

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Control the tank to search the maze for your enemies. Obstacles block the field of view, which you can use to hide, or destroy to create a better view and direction of fire. While firing a cannon can also give away your position, it can also be used properly as bait to attract a target.
